summary: Completed frontend testing of new features: Thematic Axes page, Events page alert with buyer personas, and Contacts page grouping buttons. All requested features are working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 Not Found - endpoint may not be implemented

passed_tests: Thematic Axes page (/thematic-axes): Shows 5 initial themes (Storytelling, Liderazgo, IA, Marca Personal, Ventas)
Thematic Axes page: 'Agregar Tema' button is present and functional
Thematic Axes page: Create theme dialog opens with name and description fields
Thematic Axes page: New theme can be created successfully
Thematic Axes page: Edit and delete buttons are visible on each theme card
Events page (/events): Alert shows buyer personas without future events
Events page: Alert shows fictitious names (display_name): Mariana Otros, Roberto Otros, Mateo, Carlos Otros, Diana Otros
Events page: Buyer personas are ordered by contact count (descending): 298, 181, 133, 80, 77...
Events page: 'Crear' buttons are present for each buyer persona in alert
Events page: Clicking 'Crear' opens theme selection dialog
Events page: Theme selection dialog shows all thematic axes
Events page: 'Generar título con IA' button is present in theme selection dialog
Contacts page (/contacts): 3 grouping buttons present (Buyer Persona, Cargo, Sector)
Contacts page: Default grouping by Buyer Persona shows fictitious names
Contacts page: Clicking 'Cargo' changes grouping to job titles
Contacts page: Clicking 'Sector' changes grouping to sectors
Contacts page: Groups are ordered by contact count (descending)
Contacts page: Clicking on company name opens 'Editar Empresa' dialog
Contacts page: Edit company dialog has sector/industry select dropdown
critical_code_review_comments: The /api/hubspot/sectors endpoint returns 404 - this may need to be implemented if sector data is required for the company edit dialog
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted test theme 'Test Theme - Innovación' during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working correctly. The Thematic Axes page shows 5 initial themes with CRUD functionality. The Events page alert shows buyer personas without future events with fictitious names ordered by contact count. The Contacts page has 3 grouping buttons (Buyer Persona, Cargo, Sector) that reorganize contacts correctly. Clicking on company names opens an edit dialog with sector selection.

thematic_axes_page.details: Shows 5 initial themes: Storytelling y Presentaciones de Impacto, Liderazgo y Equipos Autónomos, Inteligencia Artificial, Marca Personal, Ventas y Persuasión. CRUD operations work correctly.

events_alert_buyer_personas.details: Alert shows buyer personas without future events with fictitious names (display_name) ordered by contact count: Mariana Otros (298), Roberto Otros (181), Mateo (133), Carlos Otros (80), Diana Otros (77)

events_create_with_theme.details: Clicking 'Crear' on a buyer persona opens theme selection dialog with all thematic axes and 'Generar título con IA' button

contacts_grouping_buttons.details: 3 buttons (Buyer Persona, Cargo, Sector) change grouping correctly. Groups are ordered by contact count (descending)

contacts_edit_company.details: Clicking on company name opens 'Editar Empresa' dialog with sector/industry select dropdown
